dcterms:description: A dataset of doctor-patient dialogues collected from Chunyu-Doctor, an online medical consultation website, focusing on cardiology. The dialogues are annotated with symptoms, surgeries, tests, and other medical information, along with their statuses.
dcterms:title: MIE Dataset
